Uses of Class
xtc.util.Tool

Packages that use Tool
xtc.lang Language-specific support for C and Java. 
xtc.lang.cpp This package implements the SuperC parsing engine for parsing all of C. 
xtc.lang.jeannie A compiler contributed to xtc that integrates Java with C. 
xtc.parser Rats!, a parser generator supporting extensible syntax.
